movies.title: Dedictví aneb Kurvaseneríká
movies.plot: Vlasticka died. Village church, funeral carriage pulled by horses, priest, and companions residents Olsan special life Bohumil Stejskal, a multi-millionaire by the will of God from Legacy I got older. Bohumil a little old. Added his possession, charge, kilograms and children. Woman lost her life. Plays music, sings local women's choir Quail, which was Vlasticka member. Death known approximates. All are sad, or so at least appear. Behind the wall of the cemetery stopped older Mercedes and it performs well Stale "Actress" Irena. Regards funeral over the wall inside will not dare. I leave before the end of the ceremony.
movies.simplePlot: Vlasticka died. Village church, funeral carriage pulled by horses, priest, and companions residents Olsan special life Bohumil Stejskal, a multi-millionaire by the will of God from Legacy I...

biography.bio: Lucie Borhyová was born on April 16, 1978 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Televizní noviny (1994), Hogo fogo (2000) and Bailando - Tancím pro tebe (2007).
biography.name: Lucie Borhyová

biography.bio: Petr Cadek was born on December 29, 1978 in Liberec, Czechoslovakia. He is known for his work on StarDance aneb kdyz hvezdy tancí (2006), Lord of War (2005) and Show Jana Krause (2010). He has been married to Jitka Cvancarová since September 24, 2011. They have one child.
biography.name: Petr Cadek

biography.bio: Jan Censký was born on May 1, 1961 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Ordinace v ruzové zahrade 2 (2008), Pojistovna stestí (2004) and Life at the Mansion (1995).
biography.name: Jan Censký

biography.bio: Ivana Chýlková was born on September 27, 1963 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Díky za kazdé nové ráno (1994), Perfect Days - I zeny maji sve dny (2011) and Seducer (2002).
biography.name: Ivana Chýlková

biography.bio: Jitka Cvancarová was born on March 23, 1978 in Melník, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Ordinace v ruzové zahrade (2005), Qui a peur du loup (2008) and Vinari (2014). She has been married to Petr Cadek since September 24, 2011. They have one child.
biography.name: Jitka Cvancarová

biography.bio: Miroslav Donutil was born on February 7, 1951 in Trebíc, Czechoslovakia [now Czech Republic]. He is an actor and writer, known for Cosy Dens (1999), Zelary (2003) and The Inheritance or Fuckoffguysgoodday (1992). He is married to Zuzana Donutilova.
biography.name: Miroslav Donutil

biography.bio: Jaromír Dulava was born on September 25, 1960. He is an actor, known for Dark Blue World (2001), Moi qui ai servi le roi d'Angleterre (2006) and Grandhotel (2006).
biography.name: Jaromír Dulava

biography.bio: Arnost Goldflam was born on September 22, 1946 in Brno, Czechoslovakia. He is known for his work on Greedy Guts (2000), The Zookeeper's Wife (2017) and Ruffiano and Sweeteeth (1997).
biography.name: Arnost Goldflam

biography.placeOfBirth: Pilsen, Protectorate Bohemia and Moravia [now Plzen, Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Karel Gott was born on July 14, 1939 in Pilsen, Protectorate Bohemia and Moravia. He has been married to Ivana Machackova since January 7, 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Karel Gott

biography.bio: Vlastimil Harapes was born on July 24, 1946 in Chomutov, Czechoslovakia. He is known for his work on Beauty and the Beast (1978), Day for My Love (1977) and Marketa Lazarová (1967).
biography.name: Vlastimil Harapes

biography.bio: Dagmar Havlová was born on March 22, 1953 in Brno, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Leaving (2011), Normal the Düsseldorf Ripper (2009) and The Inheritance or Fuckoffguysgoodday (1992). She was previously married to Václav Havel and Radvít Novák.
biography.name: Dagmar Havlová

biography.bio: Karel Hermánek was born on October 17, 1947 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Gympl s (r)ucením omezeným (2012), Stalingrad (1993) and Kolya (1996). He is married to Hana Hermánková. They have three children.
biography.name: Karel Hermánek

biography.placeOfBirth: Pec pod Snezkou, Czechoslovakia [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Robert Jasków was born on December 4, 1969 in Pec pod Snezkou, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Expozitura (2008), Dune (2000) and Enfant 44 (2015).
biography.name: Robert Jasków

biography.bio: Hana Krízková was born on August 15, 1957 in Strakonice, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Osklivka Katka (2008), Jak se staví sen (2007) and Doktor od jezera hrochu (2010).
biography.name: Hana Krízková

biography.bio: Milan Lasica was born on February 3, 1940 in Zvolen, Slovakia. He is an actor, known for Moi qui ai servi le roi d'Angleterre (2006), Hostage (2014) and Srdecný pozdrav ze zemekoule (1983). He is married to Magda Vásáryová. They have two children. He was previously married to Zora Kolínska.
biography.name: Milan Lasica
